citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process at 11:23am on October
31st, 2023. Contact was made via phone with a facility representative at 11:39am. The representative communicated that
no responsible adult would be available for inspection today.
End Section

narrative:
